casebody.data:
Luis Ariel RIVERA
v.
COMMISSIONER OF CORRECTION Supreme Court of Connecticut. Decided February 20, 2019

Temmy Ann Miller, assigned counsel, in support of the petition.

Steven R. Strom, assistant attorney general, in opposition.

The petitioner Luis Ariel Rivera's petition for certification to appeal from the Appellate Court, 186 Conn. App. 506, 200 A.3d. 701 (2018), is denied.

D'AURIA, J., did not participate in the consideration of or decision on this petition.
